metadata.feature_description: Integrates Bootstrap responsive grid system for column layouts.

steps.action: Navigated to home page and entered edit mode to access Content Layout modules
steps.expected: Page loads with Content Layout module visible
steps.actual: Page loaded successfully with multiple Content Layout modules visible (F30A and 9977 layouts)

steps.action: Used browser evaluate to check if bootstrap.min.css is loaded in the page
steps.expected: Bootstrap CSS file should be loaded from ContentLayout module path

steps.action: Verified presence of .dnn-cl parent class elements on page
steps.expected: Page should contain elements with .dnn-cl class for Bootstrap scoping
steps.actual: Found 3 elements with .dnn-cl class on page, confirming Bootstrap styles are scoped correctly
At 1280px, the 4-column layout (HOME THEATERS, BLU-RAY PLAYERS, MONITORS, CAMERAS) displayed all 4 columns horizontally using col-lg-3 classes

steps.expected: Columns should remain side-by-side at tablet breakpoint (col-sm-3)
steps.actual: At 768px, the 4-column layout remained horizontal with smaller column widths, col-sm-3 classes active

steps.action: Used browser evaluate to inspect column CSS classes applied to Content Layout panes
steps.expected: Panes should have Bootstrap column classes (col-lg-*, col-md-*, col-sm-*, col-xs-*)
steps.actual: Found 6 elements with Bootstrap column classes. 2-column layout uses 'col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12', 4-column layout uses 'col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-3 col-xs-12'

steps.action: Verified CSS classes match expected Bootstrap 12-grid system values
steps.expected: 50% split uses col-*-6, 25% split uses col-*-3
steps.actual: Confirmed: 50/50 split layout (F30A) uses col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12. 4-column layout (9977) uses col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-3 col-xs-12 for each column
At 375px mobile width, the 2-column layout correctly stacked vertically with WEARABLES taking full width and other content below it

steps.action: Verified col-xs-12 class behavior on mobile
steps.expected: All columns should become full-width on extra-small screens
steps.actual: Confirmed columns are using col-xs-12 class which makes them 100% width on mobile, causing vertical stacking

observations: Bootstrap CSS is loaded from ContentLayout module path: /DesktopModules/DnnCorp/ContentLayout/Css/bootstrap.min.css
Bootstrap 3.2.0 grid system is scoped to .dnn-cl class to prevent conflicts with other site styles
ColumnSizesHelper.cs generates appropriate Bootstrap classes based on column size configuration
respond.js is injected for IE8 compatibility via conditional comments in View.ascx.cs
The 4-column layout in edit mode may display differently due to DNN's edit mode UI overlays, but Bootstrap classes are correctly applied
Code confirms responsive breakpoints: xs (<768px), sm (>=768px), md (>=992px), lg (>=1200px)
